name: DNS Launcher
short_description:
NOTE TO ANYONE THAT DOWNLOADS NOW:
    If you havent noticed yet, the program is currently     being rewritten and I have changed the structure of the downloads section so the current version will not work currently, I will fix this in 1.1 as I'm making the program better, sorry for anyone that downloaded.

DNS Launcher is a new and improved installer/launcher for the DNS TechPack, that takes the hassle of installing the updates that come very quick and painless, while still giving you full control over your installation, giving your exactly what your what and nothing you don't want.
summary: DNS Launcher is a improved installer/launcher for the DNS TechPack
